    <div id="guide_header_title">
     <h1>
      <span class="guidetitle">
       History of Modern Architecture &nbsp;
      </span>
     </h1>
    </div>
    <div class="guideattr" id="guideattr">
     <span id="lastupdate" class="lastupdate">

     </span>
     <span class="guideurl">

    <div id="content">
     <div id="contentleft" style="width:230px;">
      <div id="leftboxes">
       <div id="wrapbox16952326">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="16952326">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title16952326">
          <div class="bi_text">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           Need help with your research?
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_1" id="content16952326">
          <p>
          </p>
          <p>
           <em>
            Contact:
           </em>
           <br />
           <br />
           Kelly Cannon
           <br />
           Humanities &amp; Business Librarian
           <br />
           phone: x3602
           <br />
           email: kcannon@muhlenberg.edu
           <br />
          </p>
          <div id="boxatt16952326" class="boxatt">
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
       <div id="wrapbox16952327">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="16952327">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title16952327">
          <div class="bi_text">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           Getting to the full text
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_1" id="content16952327">
          <p>
           Once you have found the citation of a journal article you're interested in, click on the
           <strong>
            Check for Full Text
           </strong>
           <span>
            &nbsp;buttons
           </span>
           &nbsp;found next to the citation, or run a journal title search in Trexler Library's
           <a href="https://muhlenberg.on.worldcat.org/advancedsearch" target="_blank">
            Encompass Search.
           </a>
          </p>
          <div id="boxatt16952327" class="boxatt">
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
      </div>
     </div>
     <div id="contentcenter" style="width:520px;padding-left:0px; margin-left:0px; margin-right:8px; float:left;">
      <div id="centerboxes">
       <div id="wrapbox16952383">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="16952383">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title16952383">
          <div class="bi_links">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           Reference works
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_3" id="content16952383">
          <div id="boxatt16952383" class="boxatt">
           <div class="itemlist">
            <ul>
             <li id="link20648645">
              <a id="link_20648645" href="https://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://www.oxfordartonline.com/" target="_blank" onclick="hit(20648645,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'History of Modern Architecture', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 18640055}); ">
               Oxford Art Online
              </a>
              &nbsp;&nbsp;
              <div id="popupinfo20648645" class="popupdiv">
              </div>
              <a href="#" onclick="cursorXY(event); showAlert(250,3,20648645,0); return false;" title="More Information">
               <div class="b_moreinfo">
                &nbsp;&nbsp;
               </div>
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               An expanding range of Oxfordâ€™s acclaimed art reference works: Grove Art Online, the Benezit Dictionary of Artists, the Encyclopedia of Aesthetics, The Oxford Companion to Western Art, and The Concise Oxford Dictionary of Art Terms, as well as many specially commissioned articles and bibliographies available exclusively online.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link25526913">
              <a id="link_25526913" href="http://www.oxfordartonline.com/subscriber/article/grove/art/T087095pg2" target="_blank" onclick="hit(25526913,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'History of Modern Architecture', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 25526913}); ">
               U.S. Architecture (Oxford Art Online)
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link20648986">
              <a id="link_20648986" href="http://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://search.credoreference.com/content/title/thca" target="_blank" onclick="hit(20648986,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'History of Modern Architecture', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 20648986}); ">
               The Thames &amp; Hudson Dictionary of 20th Century Architecture
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Contains wide ranging and authoritative coverage of the whole spectrum of architecture and urban planning in the 20th century, and of leading architects and engineers the world over.
              </div>
             </li>
            </ul>
           </div>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
       <div id="wrapbox16952332">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="16952332">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title16952332">
          <div class="bi_links">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           Scholarly books on your chosen building or architect
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_3" id="content16952332">
          <div id="boxatt16952332" class="boxatt">
           <div class="itemlist">
            <ul>
             <li id="link25526924">
              <a id="link_25526924" href="http://muhlenberg.on.worldcat.org/advancedsearch" target="_blank" onclick="hit(25526924,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'History of Modern Architecture', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 18508793}); ">
               Encompass Search
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Encompass Search searches for books and other resources, first in our own library, and then beyond, in other research libraries.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link19995864">
              <a id="link_19995864" href="http://books.google.com/" target="_blank" onclick="hit(19995864,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'History of Modern Architecture', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 19995864}); ">
               Google Books
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Many authors have placed their works in Google Books as a way to increase exposure and hopefully sell more copies of their works.  Any full text that appears may not be easy to extract or manipulate, and often only snippets are available for viewing online. Use the "Find in a Library" option to "request item" on interlibrary loan (you need to be "connected to the Muhlenberg Col Libr network" to do so).
              </div>
             </li>
            </ul>
           </div>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
       <div id="wrapbox16952329">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="16952329">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title16952329">
          <div class="bi_links">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           Articles from art magazines or scholarly journals
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_3" id="content16952329">
          <div id="boxatt16952329" class="boxatt">
           <div class="itemlist">
            <ul>
             <li id="link20635806">
              <a id="link_20635806" href="https://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://search.ebscohost.com/login.aspx?authtype=ip,uid&amp;profile=ehost&amp;defaultdb=31h" target="_blank" onclick="hit(20635806,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'History of Modern Architecture', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 12329245}); ">
               America: History &amp; Life with Full Text
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               The definitive database of literature covering the history and culture of the United States and Canada, from prehistory to the present. With selective indexing for 1,700 journals from 1964 to present, this database is without question the most important bibliographic reference tool for students and scholars of U.S. and Canadian history. Full text journals include American Historical Review, American 19th Century History, American Studies, Early American Studies, Journal of American Culture, Journal of American History, Journal of Early American History, and Journal of Military History.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link20635793">
              <a id="link_20635793" href="https://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://search.ebscohost.com/login.asp?profile=ehost&amp;defaultdb=aft,air" target="_blank" onclick="hit(20635793,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'History of Modern Architecture', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 12728981}); ">
               Art Full Text
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Index and selected full text from art periodicals, 1929-present. Full text journals include Architects' Journal, Art Bulletin, and Art Journal.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link25526925">
              <a id="link_25526925" href="http://scholar.google.com/" target="_blank" onclick="hit(25526925,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'History of Modern Architecture', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 19974037}); ">
               Google Scholar
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               May be used in conjunction with interlibrary loan. Access to full text is maximized by searching from the Muhlenberg network.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link20635811">
              <a id="link_20635811" href="https://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://search.ebscohost.com/login.asp?profile=ehost&amp;defaultdb=30h" target="_blank" onclick="hit(20635811,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'History of Modern Architecture', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 12329218}); ">
               Historical Abstracts with Full Text
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Provides indexing, abstracts, and selected full text of articles appearing in history journals, with emphasis on world history from 1450 to present (excluding the U.S. and Canada which are covered in America: History and Life). It includes citations to books, journal articles, and dissertations.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link20635777">
              <a id="link_20635777" href="https://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://www.jstor.org/" target="_blank" onclick="hit(20635777,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'History of Modern Architecture', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 12728724}); ">
               JSTOR
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Full text of scholarly journals from most academic disciplines. Coverage is from the inception of the journal through three to five years ago. Includes over 200 journals specific to the study of art and architecture. Includes full text of African Arts, American Art, Archives of Asian Art, Bulletin-Metropolitan Museum of Art, and Burlington Magazine
              </div>
             </li>
            </ul>
           </div>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
      </div>
     </div>
     <div id="contentright" style="width:209px;float:left; padding-right:0px;">
      <div id="profile4611033" class="profile_wrapper">
      </div>
      <div id="rightboxes">
       <div id="wrapbox16952334">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="16952334">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title16952334">
          <div class="bi_links">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           Citing Sources
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_3" id="content16952334">
          <p>
           For tips on citing print and electronic sources, visit Trexler Library's
           <a href="http://trexler.muhlenberg.edu/research/citation-guides.html">
            <em>
             Citation Guides for Print and Electronic Resources
            </em>
           </a>
           .
          </p>
          <p>
           For automated citation, try the shareware
           <a href="http://www.zotero.org/">
            <em>
             Zotero
            </em>
           </a>
           .
          </p>
          <p>
          </p>
          <div id="boxatt16952334" class="boxatt">
           <div class="itemlist">
            <ul>
            </ul>
            &nbsp;&nbsp;
           </div>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
       <div id="wrapbox16952335">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="16952335">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title16952335">
          <div class="bi_text">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           Interlibrary Loan
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_1" id="content16952335">
          Most any item not immediately available in our library or in the research databases can be requested on
          <a href="http://trexler.muhlenberg.edu/services/interlibrary-loan.html">
           interlibrary loan
          </a>
          by filling out the appropriate form for
          <a href="https://library.muhlenberg.edu/illj~S0">
           articles
          </a>
          or
          <a href="https://library.muhlenberg.edu/illb~S0">
           books
          </a>
          .
          <div id="boxatt16952335" class="boxatt">
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
      </div>
     </div>
    </div>
    <div id="footer">
     <div id="footer_topline">
      Powered by
      <a href="http://www.springshare.com">
       Springshare
      </a>
      ; All rights reserved.
      <span id="footer_support_link">
       <a href="/support.php">
        Report a tech support issue
       </a>
       .
      </span>
     </div>
     <div id="print_link">
      View this page in a format suitable for
      <a href="/print_content.php?pid=559428&amp;sid=4611033">
       printers and screen-readers
      </a>
      or
      <a href="/content_mobile.php?pid=559428&amp;sid=4611033">
       mobile devices
      </a>
      .
     </div>
    </div>
    <div id="customFooter">
    </div>
